title: Three Fav champs
body:

Id like to see the most favourited champs, so post below.
My favourite (personally) is Ahri, Rengar and Master yi. Make sure 2 comment :D

Holy shiza, I forgot Galileo existed. You still play him?

Yes I still play him.  Any time I see an AP jung or top on the enemy team I pick him whether I'm mid or top and even occasionally if I'm jungle.  I pretty much never lose lane as Galio because his sustain is so insane once he gets catalyst.  I love being able to take an enemy mage's full combo early-mid game (around 1 completed item for everyone) only taking 100-200 damage and use a single Q to chunk them down to half HP.  What I don't understand is why nobody plays him.  He has tank, sustain, cc, damage, super easy last hitting, one of the biggest game changing ults in the game, and he can literally tank a tower forever late game.  As far as I know, he is the only champ in the game that can tank a tower infinitely without some gimmick like thornmail and gunblade with a bunch of enemies hitting you.


Here is a jungle game I did well with him in just a few games ago.
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2364429517/209287161?tab=overview

This is a test I did before they removed the laser on inhib towers.  I was able to tank an inhib tower laser and minions for 54 seconds with this build.  I did not use the ohmwrecker or zhonya actives for thist test.  They were just for the base stats.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2314641046/209287161?tab=stats
good for you! Ill have to try Gallio JG

The only reason it worked so well that game is because the enemy team comp.  I was last pick and Galio was the perfect choice to counter them at any position.   Any time you have to build armor early or mid game on Galio he isn't nearly as strong.

{{champion:80}}  The reason I started playing this game. I got to be a Spartan and kick everyone's ass.  

If I'm playing SR there's about a 90% chance I'm playing him.  So everyone else is far down, but if I had to pick my next two:

{{champion:6}}  In a game of beautiful women, hunky warriors, and a generally smooth aesthetic, there is one who stands apart. The Ugly Crab Man! I love this guy, one of Riot's more unique and disgusting looking characters. I hope we get more grotesques as the game goes on.

{{champion:115}} "We need AP" my friends said.  "Please play a mage, we are an all AD team comp," my teammates cried.  "Fine," I replied.  "But I'm not going to be one of those pansy ass spell slingers.  No, I'm going to chuck bombs at people!"  I enjoy Ziggs for that alone, but, honestly, he's below the other two because holy crap his voice is annoying.
